akn:content.akn:p:
§ 13103. Remedies as cumulative Except as otherwise provided in this part, the remedies provided under this part are in addition to remedies existing under another law or common law. (Added Pub. L. 104–88, title I, § 103, Dec. 29, 1995, 109 Stat. 856.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsProvisions similar to those in this section were contained in section 10103 of this title prior to the general amendment of this subtitle by Pub. L. 104–88, § 102(a).
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective Jan. 1, 1996, except as otherwise provided in Pub. L. 104–88, see section 2 of Pub. L. 104–88, set out as a note under section 1301 of this title.
